name: Adventures of 1C!
description:
In this 2-characters-1-player puzzle platformer, you take control of 1C, a robot and their clone, who are located in entirely different places of the same cave! Using the handy items (one use only) you can select at the start of a level, you'll have to think of ways to solve the puzzle in order to progress through the caves! 

Just be aware that some things you do on one side, can have an effect on the other side.

At the beginning of the level, you'll have to select the items, and will be shown both rooms of the level, so you can choose the item to solve the puzzle. There are a total of 7 levels.

Items
  • High Jump: Increases the character's jump height for 5 seconds
  • Speed Boost: Doubles the character's movement speed for 5 seconds
  • Freeze Player: Freezes the character in place, stopping them from moving during 5 seconds
Keyboard Controls 
  • WASD Keys/Arrow Keys: Move left and right
  • I Key/SpaceBar: Jump
  • R Key: Restart level
  • Num 1/Z Key: Use item for Left character
  • Num 2/X Key: Use item for Right character
  • Use mouse to select the item

This game was made in 48 hours for the GMTK Game Jam 2021.
